basics.name: Samantha Fritz
basics.label: Project Manager |Â Information Superhero | Open Access Champion | INFJ
basics.summary: I am an information management professional with a passion for open access, information literacy education, and helping people connect with and make sense of data. Having worked nearly a decade with academic researchers, I am driven to support information and resource dissemination to positively transform the way researchers view, experience, interpret and share information and knowledge.
